thumb.title: 深田萌絵のテーマソングえいご２
thumb.description: [Verse] Shadows move quick sparks in the night Every thought burns like flickering light Chasing truth with her fiery gaze In this maze we spin endless days [Chorus] 深田萌絵 rise fierce and strong Break the silence right every wrong Dance through fire shake the chains Her voice cuts through the endless rain [VerseTruth's a ghost in an endless war A treasure map with a broken floor She steps alone where no one dares Light in darkness nobody compares [Chorus] 深田萌絵 rise fierce and strong Break the silence right every wrong Dance through fire shake the chains Her voice cuts through the endless rain [Bridge]Gears of life they grind us stone Yet her fire makes the cold world moan Twist the rules rewrite the score Stand again even when we're sore [Chorus] 深田萌絵 rise fierce and strong Break the silence right every wrong Dance through fire shake the chains Her voice cuts through the endless rain]
